per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=tic = min(time-tin,.1);
per_frame_4=tin = time;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=vol = (bass_att + treb_att + mid_att)*.333333;
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=ra = 1/tic*.25;
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=treb_avg = tic*(treb_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*treb);
per_frame_11=mid_avg = tic*(mid_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*mid);
per_frame_12=bass_avg = tic*(bass_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*bass);
per_frame_13=vav = tic*(vav*(1/tic - ra) + ra*(bass+treb+mid)*.33333);
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=tt = tt + tic*treb*treb;
per_frame_16=mt = mt + tic*mid*mid;
per_frame_17=bt = bt + tic*bass*bass;
per_frame_18=vt = vt + tic*vav;
per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=sp = abs(vav - slide)*.1;
per_frame_21=slide = if(above(slide,vav),slide-tic*sp,slide+tic*sp) + (1-toc)*vav*.2;
per_frame_22=toc = 1;
per_frame_23=
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=//dx = (treb_avg - mid_avg)*.1;
per_frame_26=//dy = (bass_avg - treb_avg)*.1;
per_frame_27=
per_frame_28=q1 = (bt*2 - (mt + tt))*1;
per_frame_29=q2 = mid_avg;
per_frame_30=q3 = bass_avg;

per_pixel_1=zoom = zoom + rad*0.1;

per_pixel_24=w=sin(ang*22+sin(time/8) )/2+.5;

per_pixel_27=///////////////////////////////////////

per_pixel_30=crx=cr2-cr1;
per_pixel_31=ci=rad;
per_pixel_32=cb=.25  ;
per_pixel_33=crs=2;
per_pixel_34=cr=pow(sin(ci*6.3-(cb*6.3))/2+.5,crs)*crx+cr1;
per_pixel_35=cqr=if( above (ci,.25+cb),cr,crx+cr1);crr=if( below(ci,1.5),cqr,crx+cr1);
per_pixel_36=jx1=crr;
per_pixel_37=kx1=1-crr;

per_pixel_39=gjdx=dx;

per_pixel_46=gjcy=cy;
per_pixel_47=gjwp=warp;
per_pixel_48=
per_pixel_49=dx=(jx1*gjdx+kx1*gkdx);
per_pixel_50=dy=(jx1*gjdy+kx1*gkdy);

per_pixel_52=sy=(jx1*gjsy+kx1*gksy);
